alert.note: Alert for Montgomery; Telfair; Toombs; Wheeler (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 02 at 9:00PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Toombs, eastern Telfair, southern Wheeler and Montgomery Counties through 945 PM EST... At 900 PM EST, a strong thunderstorm was near Alston, or near Mount Vernon, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, pea sized hail and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lyons, Mount Vernon, Vidalia, Lumber City, Uvalda, Ailey, Scotland, Higgston, Santa Claus, Alston, Towns, Ohoopee, New Branch, Spring Hill, McNatt Falls, South Thompson, English Eddy, Cedar Crossing, Johnson Corner and Jordan. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM EST for central, southeastern and east central Georgia.
